_sText: Screenshot B is just an example map of how it can look like. It's not included to the RAR. RAR includes Neon Textures VTF+VMT (pre configurated and pink) A map of example light-spawning (HDR enabled + Cubemaps) lights.rad preconfigurated Scale of the neon texture (decides how often lightspawn repeats) Top box = 0.1 Middle box = 0.25 Bottom box = 1 This refers to my tutorial about Neon Stripes / Textures HDR
